original_text: For, lo, the wicked bend their bow, they make ready their arrow upon the string, that they may privily shoot at the upright in heart.
korean_text: 악인이 활을 당기고 화살을 시위에 먹임이여 마음이 바른 자를 어두운 데서 쏘려 하는도다

sentences.original_text: For, lo, the wicked bend their bow
they make ready their arrow upon the string
that they may privily shoot at the upright in heart
sentences.korean_translation: 마음이 정직한 자를 비밀리에 쏘려 함이로다
